name: sweph
description: The definitive Swiss Ephemeris bindings for Node.js
author: Timotej Valentin Rojko

scripts.preinstall: node -e "const { readdirSync, readFileSync, writeFileSync } = require('fs'); const file = readdirSync('./src/functions').map((x,i) => readFileSync('./src/functions/' + x, 'utf8').replace(/args/g, 'args' + i).replace('#include <sweph.h>', '')).reduce((a,b) => a + b, '#include <sweph.h>'); writeFileSync('./src/functions.cpp', file, 'utf8');"
scripts.test: node -e "const s = require('./'); const c = s.calc(2222222,0,4); console.log('OK')"
